content: Charu Sharma - IIIT Hyderabad CONTACT Menu Charu Sharma Assistant Professor, Ph.D (IIT Hyderabad) Email: charu.sharma[at]iiit.ac.in Publications Institute Webpage Personal homepage Research areas Geometric machine/deep learning (graphs and point clouds), assignment problem. Research Centers/Labs Machine Learning Lab (MLL) enables machines, especially computers to learn from environments and make their own decisions. Awards & Achievements Awarded start-up research grant by Science and Engineering Research Board (SERB), September 2022.
